cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portd to 0 will cause SCTP connection failure as port 0 is invalid and cannot be used for network communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_portd to 0 will cause SCTP connection failure as port 0 is invalid and cannot be used for network communication.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_portd 設定為 0 會導致 SCTP 連接失敗，因為端口 0 無效，無法用於網路通訊。
